mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1000 A.AS_NUM, A.AS_NAME, B.AB_NAME, A.FA_NAME, A.AS_MODEL, A.AS_ACCE, A.AS_SEL_NUM, C.SC_NAME, A.AS_PRC, A.AS_COL_DATE, A.AS_FIELD1, A.AS_FIELD2, A.AS_FIELD3, A.AS_FIELD4, D.UD_PRT_NAME, E.OG_NAME, A.AS_USER, A.AL_USAGE FROM ASSETS A INNER JOIN AS_BRAND B ON A.AB_ID = B.AB_ID INNER JOIN AS_SOURCE C ON A.SC_ID = C.SC_ID INNER JOIN USE_DEPT D ON D.UD_ID = A.UD_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT OG_NAME, OG_FATHER_ID, OG_ID FROM EPS_ORG..ORG_SYS) E ON A.OG_ID = E.OG_ID WHERE (A.AS_NUM = #{asNum})
